posts.title: Show HN: Cross-Platform IDE for PostgreSQL
Show HN: turn videos into ASCII art (open source, js+canvas)
posts.website_info: Turn videos into ASCII pixel art! Use your webcam feed or upload a video, then use the controls to adjust the colors, resolution, text style, etc......

posts.title: Show HN: I built a tool that creates and edits videos using text prompts
posts.description: I have built a simple way to turn ideas into videos and also edit the them using text. I used python for backend and ts/js on the frontend. it's using open-ai models for LLM and Flux for image generation. I will answer any question that you might have regarding the tech stack.
posts.website_info: Cliptalk helps creators create short videos from text without the need for any video editing skills. Cliptalk uses AI to turn text scripts into videos in seconds and automatically publishes videos to other platforms such as Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, TikTok videos, and more.

posts.title: Show HN: web2sdk – Turn any third-party API into a Python SDK
posts.website_info: Generate Python SDKs for any third-party API by intercepting network requests. - jasonwcfan/web2sdk

posts.title: Show HN: AI Hugging - Make People Hug With AI Free Online
posts.description: AI Hugging is a free online AI video generator that creates heartwarming AI hug videos from static photos. Using advanced AI technology, it merges images to produce virtual hugging scenes, bringing your photos to life with emotion.
posts.website_info: AI Hugging is a Video Studio AI Hug Video Generator that can make AI Hug Video with static photos.

posts.title: Show HN: Homemade Automated Solar Concentrator
posts.description:
Hi HN!

I quit my job two years ago to have more time to work on my side projects.

The main one is an automated solar concentrator.

I've just open-sourced it, it's not perfect nor finished, and I still have a lot of ideas for further development, but I'm interested in knowing what you think of it.

There are many applications where concentrated solar power could be a viable environmental and economic solution, I hope this technology will one day be more widely used.

Feel free to give any feedback and ask questions.
posts.website_info: Homemade automated solar concentrator 🔧 ☀️ 🔎. Contribute to remipch/solar_concentrator development by creating an account on GitHub.
